html:
7.18.24  3:29 pm   when you're on a really good idea, would you characterize the feeling in your head as itchy scratchy or more like humming

      it's a glowing

7.18.24  3:20 pm   does time matter

      yes

7.18.24  1:38 pm   favorite album?

      haven't found one yet

7.18.24  1:26 pm   what's your take on categories?

      can't live with them, can't live without them

7.18.24  11:50 am   best word in the world

      to

7.18.24  10:19 am   do you have a growth mindset?

      yes

7.18.24  3:03 am   whats ur favorite dollar bill

      the obvious answer here is the US $2, because of its unique status of being totally real, valid, still printed, and yet completely obscure

7.18.24  2:45 am   opinion on music

      so crazy it just might work

7.18.24  12:55 am   are the things you say actually true

      sometimes

7.17.24  11:55 pm   is there a genre of music that consists of songs that never end?

     sure, like background music that loops behind a menu screen for example

      would you wanna try it?

     in 2015 i made a number of bits that were designed to loop infinitely

7.17.24  11:53 pm   who lives in a pineapple under the sea?

      it's hard to tell these days, because everyone still shows up to the video chat with a book shelf behind them or at least a picture of a book shelf

7.17.24  11:41 pm   What equipment do you use?

      brick and mortar

7.17.24  9:26 pm   What would you change in your older videos?

      i'd make them better, but not after they've been released

7.17.24  9:12 pm   my dad called you a crooner, what do you think of that?

      fair enough

7.17.24  9:08 pm   favorite rgb color? knowing you it can be all of 'em

      g

7.17.24  9:08 pm   Would you dress up as SpongeBob the next time you went to a convention?

      not necessary. i already am sponge bob

7.17.24  8:15 pm   how close to the next video?

      i'm working on it now

7.17.24  7:10 pm   what's your favourite type of cheese

      improbable

7.17.24  7:08 pm   Who let the cat out of the bag?

      you might have to do it

7.17.24  7:07 pm   Are washing machines machine-washable?

      no

7.17.24  6:41 pm   Would you rather be a pirate captain in the 1800s or a Wyoming mayor in the early 1900s?

      the second choice there seems vastly preferable

7.17.24  6:35 pm   so you would like to learn every language, but of course (most people) have to start somewhere. what would be the next language you want to learn?

      after my ability in dutch gets high enough to reasonably consider myself bilingual, the most likely 3rd language to go after would be french, building upon the modest amount of progress i made with it many years ago in school

7.17.24  4:30 pm   Would you ever live in a simulation?

      i'm not sure

7.17.24  4:25 pm   apparently, 95% of our thoughts are the same as the day before, why do you think that is?

      let's back up for a moment. i don't particularly agree with this hypothesis

7.17.24  4:15 pm   When making a song, in what order should you record the different instruments and the vocals? Say you're making a song with guitar, drums, bass guitar, vocals, and keyboard just as an example?

      the only way to really get good results is to record everything at the same time. if you have to do it separately, then at each moment it will probably be a different instrument that should be recorded first. but of course it's also important that each instrument is recorded all the way through in one pass. this creates a paradox because it's impossible to satisfy those 2 conditions at the same time. maybe you assumed that i had this figured out

7.17.24  4:04 pm   Did you write "Here Comes the Sun" as a message of hope during the COVID pandemic lockdowns and crisis? This may seem obvious, but I want to understand the message behind one of my favorite pieces of your work.

      the writing was mostly completed as of 2012, and some of the original parts were written in 2010. there might have been a touch-up on the writing in 2020, i think i re-wrote from the last pre-chorus to the end. what the song is about is, when things are feeling down and dark, ............. i have some good news for you

7.17.24  4:01 pm   will you answer this question even though it is about spongebob?

      this question really is not about spongebob. it's about whether or not it's about spongebob

7.17.24  3:26 pm   When is the last time you thought about stuff?

     moments ago

7.17.24  2:35 pm   do you still use a trackpad

      i use a combination of trackpad, keyboards, sliders, and drawing tablet. depending on what best suits the particular task. for example, i'm typing this on a keyboard and the button to read the next question will also be a button. now that i think about it, the trackpad is really not involved in the questions process per se

7.17.24  1:57 pm   how many darn years has 2 plus 2 been 4 for?

      put it this way, the first photos of 2 plus 2 being 4 are black and white

7.17.24  10:44 am   four points are chosen independently and at random on the surface of a sphere (using the uniform distribution). what is the probability that the center of the sphere lies inside the resulting tetrahedron? 

      in this case it's not clear to me what is meant by 'uniform distribution'

7.17.24  9:58 am   i had a dream that i bought on overcoat. or was it a car

      it could be both. sometimes dreams have 2 items

7.17.24  9:50 am   What should I do 

      everything

7.17.24  6:40 am   do you think an artist could be "better" than another, or simply different?

      all artists are the same

7.17.24  6:14 am   i was just perusing zillow, now all i can think about are wood floors and wide angle lenses 

      i know what you mean

7.17.24  4:40 am   what's your opinion about potatoes?

      the only problem with them is that they're just too exciting

7.17.24  3:13 am   it seems like there's a mini hole in 3/5ths of things i do, since the song i made felt whole but the food i made didn't, do you feel the mini hole on occasion?

      no, but i feel like most things i do have an angle to them which really isn't adequate

7.17.24  1:04 am   will jazz continue?

      the word jazz will continue to change. whether the jazz itself will change, of course i can't say, because the word jazz has already changed so much that neither of us can be quite sure what we mean here

7.17.24  12:14 am   Great job answering questions. Love your work.

      great job answering my work. love your questions

7.16.24  9:52 pm   since everyone is talkins abt you learning other languages, which one(s) would ya like to learn?

      i would like to learn them all of course

7.16.24  8:54 pm   What should I do with my feelings overstock?

      write stories

7.16.24  8:32 pm   Anything unusual?

      yes. the.... time

7.16.24  7:14 pm   how did you think of the chord progression in the road, it broke my head

      i just made it up, in the context of what the words melodies and other chords had done so far up to that point, at every given point

7.16.24  5:19 pm   Is it better to be new in an old way or old in a new way?

      would anyone even dare to try both at the same time

7.16.24  4:44 pm   thoughts on bluebirds?

      they're never entirely blue. there's always a part of them that isn't blue

7.16.24  3:32 pm   What's your favourite soup to engage in philosophical debate with?

      i don't debate with soup. soup is always right

7.16.24  1:24 pm   Why is your song "Got to Know What's Going On" is sad... I almost cried its beautiful and sad at the same time.

      the reason for that is because i have emotions

7.16.24  12:38 pm   had a dream that you drive a beat up red pickup truck, possibly a ford or chevy. that true? 

      no

7.16.24  12:21 pm   Is the house from "out for lunch" your actual house?

      no

7.16.24  11:24 am   What was the inspiration for the song "money"? It's easily one of my favorites.

      rondo a la turca
